pr_title: Revert composite id changes for Table

timeline.bodyText: we dont need version in ID anymore
timeline.author: moizarafat

replies.bodyText: yes. that require changes to Metadatstore o/w tests fail, will update after testing Metadatastore changes.
replies.author: rishi-aga

timeline.bodyText: Instead of opening this up publicly, what if we add a method to add something to the storage instead?
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we want to throw a 500 error here.  This should be some kind of 4XX.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: Maybe throw a 403 error (HttpStatusException) for some of these that relate to client requests.
timeline.author: aklish

replies.bodyText: throwing InvalidOperationException for save and delete.
replies.author: rishi-aga

timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: This would throw an internal error (as it doesn't relate to the client request, but rather the setup of the server).
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: Instead of exposing the data storage, I wonder if it would be cleaner to add a method to add something to the storage.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we need this.  This appears to be unused.
timeline.author: aklish

replies.bodyText: Its used in QueryEngine, ColumnVisitor etc. Renamed it to metadataDictionary to make it clear.
replies.author: rishi-aga

timeline.message: Revert composite id changes for Table
